name: Boy Wonders - A Robin Dating Simulator
name_original: Boy Wonders - A Robin Dating Simulator
description:
(Please note: Robin is only available for desktop dates at this time. Sorry...)

It's a dark (k)night in Gotham City and you've just walked down the wrong alley! 

But never fear, one of the Robins is on his way to save you and maybe figure out some of his emotional baggage while he's at it.

Will you get sensitive Robin to finally open up?
Will he trust you enough to remove his mask?
Will the night end in a kiss or in heartbreak?

Find out in BOY WONDERS - A ROBIN DATING SIMULATOR!
